Footer_Description: We are Memnon Boutique Hotel and we are the best placed hotel in Egypt to visit the world famous ancient historical sites of Luxor. We take our name from the world-famous Colossi of Memnon, which are directly in front of us and form part of the temple complex of Amenhotep lll. Less than ten minutes’ walk are the magical Habu Temple and the Ramesseum. Five minutes in a taxi will take you to the Valley of the Kings, Hatshepsut Temple and the Valley of the Queens. We offer first class accommodation and services. Our sister hotel has an outdoor swimming pool where you can relax and enjoy the sun.
Home_Services_Restaurant: A distinguished group of chefs for international cuisine, find what you want here, we are waiting for you
Home_Services_Cafe: A selection of delicious drinks served according to your taste.
Home_Services_Boutique: Excellent rooms offering first class accommodation and overlooking picturesque countryside and world famous ancient Egyptian monuments.
Home_Big_Room_Guest_Description: Your choice of different rooms starts here…
Home_Cafe_Description: A distinguished group of chefs for international cuisine, find what you want here, we are waiting for you to enjoy our distinguished service in Memnon Boutique And Hotel At Luxor City, Al-Qurnah Village.
Home_Trips_Bold_Description: We're truely dedicated to make your travel experience best
Home_Trips_Desc1: We offer a range of excursions in the local area which are tailor-made to your requirements and interests.
Home_Trips_Desc2: Many of the sites are accessible on foot but we can also arrange for a pick up from the hotel by horse, camel, donkey or car. Alternatively you can hire one of our bicycles from the hotel.
Home_Reviews_Description: All Of Our Customers Reviews are here Send Your Review and keep in touch.
About_Heading_Description: We are Memnon Boutique Hotel and we are the best placed hotel in Egypt to visit the world famous ancient historical sites of Luxor. We take our name from the world-famous Colossi of Memnon, which are directly in front of us and form part of the temple complex of Amenhotep lll. Less than ten minutes’ walk are the magical Habu Temple and the Ramesseum. Five minutes in a taxi will take you to the Valley of the Kings, Hatshepsut Temple and the Valley of the Queens. We offer first class accommodation and services. Our sister hotel has an outdoor swimming pool where you can relax and enjoy the sun.
About_Villa_Description: In order to enjoy the best accommodation and the most enjoyable services in our villa, you only have to wait to receive our services
About_Trips_Description: We have many trips that help you discover ancient and modern Egypt, cultural, historical and maritime trips, let's explore Egypt with us
Rooms_Hotel_Description: We have a variety of rooms offering differnt accommodation and magnificeat views of the monoments of ancient Egyption civilization, the Theba Hills and the tranqoil countryside. All our rooms have air conditioning, Wifi, ensuite bathrooms and double beds.
Our_Rooms_Single_Description: We provide you, if you intend to stay alone, a full-service room, but only for you and nothing else
Our_Rooms_Double_Description: Do not hesitate to visit us with you and your companions, we have rooms that can accommodate two people in case you have company with you, we provide you with everything you need
Our_Rooms_Triple_Description: You and your family are invited here in Memnon because we have provided you with triple places so that the family can gather together
Rooms_Gallery_Description: Please browse our rooms and find which accommodation suits you best.
Restaurant_Head_Desc: Our restaurant is open to visitors every day from 06:00 – 22:00. For our hotel guests it is open 24 hours a day. A distinguished group of chefs will provide you with top quality international cuisine.
Restaurant_Hours_Description: Our restaurant is open to visitors every day from 09:00 until 22:00, for our hotel guests it is open 24 hours a day
